reviews.title: excelent work.
reviews.comment: Excelent Mr. Freeeman, I will seeee you up ahhhead.  A must have app, for  tablet owners.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it!
reviews.comment: This is a good app and has worked well.  I use it with my new Galaxy Note II to kill wi-fi and data sync at night.  I would really LOVE this app if it had the ability to turn on/off the 3 GPS settings on my Note II.  I emailed developer but did not hear back.  With a GPS setting, I would buy and rate 5 stars!
reviews.author: Larry Feissner

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: I use it to turn my data and autosync on and off two times a day to get my emails. My battery lasts over 3 days like this.  The app needs a shortcut on the home screen to manually turn on data when needed, or you can install another app to do this. I use Apndroid.   You have to spend some time to set it up. But once you know how to use it, its very good and powerful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Powerful Scheduler
reviews.comment: Timer bug. Schedule didn\'t show the correct setup time. E.g. Setting task to run at 18:15, it is showing the task is scheduled at 18:45.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BAD
reviews.comment: This app did what it says, but now my data connection doesn\'t work!! I checked the apn list and it deleted stuff in the apns making them not work!!! Had to reset apn settings!! :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says but....
reviews.comment: ....every time I open the app it asks me to update, but instead of updating it tries to download a non-market app. Seriously annoying. 4 stars otherwise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Only reason I got it was to mimic \"night hours\" on Cm10 which turns off all sounds and vibrate, even on keyboard presses. Unfortunately this app doesn\'t offer the ability to turn keyboard vibrate off.
reviews.author: Neil Stirton

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: There are very few free apps that can beat this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tImer app., but.......
reviews.comment: This timer app. Is great, but it doesn\'t work with widgets. Make it where a widget can be chosen to act as a switch to turn on or off in the timer. ie. The \"yellow\" tethering app widget. Then I will give 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: You can do automatic reboot on a rooted phone. also automatic wallpaper changes. Pretty much automatic everything. It will do probably 10 or more things automatically. You will love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.comment: It is fantastic. Never miss to wish anyone happy birthday, new year etc. Time any activity. If we could time emails it would been much better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most useful app you\'ll ever have!
reviews.comment: Control when not to receive calls or notifications, ie 10pm-6am. I can specify a time for my phone to change the volume to max & a different ringtone/text alert & cancel wifi so I can hear it easily at work and then reset it all for when I get home! Works faultlessly too! Best app!
reviews.author: Phil W

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its a....... More in one....... But m going to use in my galaxy ace.........
reviews.author: Ajay Dalai

reviews.title: very nice useful apps
reviews.comment: how about adding some utlity to change notification volume .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Interface has to become better.  There should be an option to add interval in tasks.
reviews.author: A Google User
